alert.note: Alert for Marion; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Horry and northeastern Marion Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 514 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Galivants Ferry, or near Mullins, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Galivants Ferry, Gapway and Rains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
